Related Projects About

Related Projects

Below are known implementation repositories associated with IoTFoundry.

MCTP-Over-Serial library for Linux
A Linux library and user space application to facilite rapid deployment of MCTP-Over-Serial deployments using Linux. (status: active)
IoTFoundry Endpoint Template Code
Template code for building IoTFoundry-compliant endpoints. (status: active)
IoTFoundry Endpoint for ATMega MCUs
Implementation of an IoTFoundry-compliant endpoint for ATMega microcontrollers. (status: active)
IoTFoundry Endpoint for Zephyr RTOS
Implementation of an IoTFoundry-compliant endpoint for Zephyr RTOS. (status: active)
IoTFoundry Endpoint for Linux and Embedded Linux
Implementation of an IoTFoundry-compliant endpoint for Linux and Embedded Linux. (status: active)
PICMG IoT Firmware
Reference MCTP and PLDM firmware implementations maintained by PICMG. (status: reference)
IoT Configurator
An example configurator for the PICMG IoT Reference Firmware. (status: reference)
IoT Builder
A firmware builder for the PICMG IoT Reference Firmware. (status: reference)

If you maintain a repository that should be listed here, please open a pull request adding it to _data/projects.yml.

See repository for license and governance documents.
